text: Another GraphQL Question wooooo :v What would cause a custom object to _not_ show up in GraphQL? Does it need to be told to show up?
Like every other custom object shows except for one

Hi Thomas, the most likely cause is an invalid name -- names in GraphQL schemas can only have ASCII characters, see the spec here: <https://spec.graphql.org/October2021/#sec-Names>

If that's not the problem you can DM me your portal ID and the missing custom object I can dig a bit further.

For future searchers:

Your object can't have hyphens ("-") in the name. It must use underscores.
